name: Dr. Cruz and the Quest of Indra (GB Studio)
name_original: Dr. Cruz and the Quest of Indra (GB Studio)
description:
This small game project was made with GB Studio. It took me about 1 month to develop this prototype. There are still things to improve. Feel free to give me your feedback!

This is a demo version.

All rights reserved. Do not distribute this game without my permission.
